name: ShipMates: Marooned (DEMO)
description:
A visual novel/dating sim starring a non-binary main character.

Wanna date a merman? Or a non-binary pirate? Or maybe you just really like your childhood best friend?

ShipMates: Marooned is a visual novel/dating sim about Skyler, an adventurous college student who's not quite sure what they want to do with their life. While out sailing with their childhood best friend Blair, they get caught up in a storm and wash up on the short of a mysterious island. Will they survive? Will they escape? Or are they stuck on this island forever?

This is a demo, including the beginning 3 chapters of the story, which introduce the story, all the characters, and lead up to the dating paths.
